usability.title: How easy was it to navigate through the app?
usability.min: 0 stars: It was very difficult to find the features; navigation was confusing.
usability.max: 5 stars: It was extremely easy; navigation is intuitive and hassle-free.

usability.title: Were you able to complete your tasks in the app without issues?
usability.min: 0 stars: I couldn't complete the tasks; it was frustrating.
usability.max: 5 stars: I was able to complete all tasks quickly and efficiently.

usability.title: How would you rate the graphical interface in terms of design and clarity?
usability.min: 0 stars: The interface is unclear and hard to understand.
usability.max: 5 stars: The interface is clear, attractive, and easy to use.

content.title: Was the app content useful to you?
content.min: 0 stars: The content was neither relevant nor useful.
content.max: 5 stars: The content was very useful and relevant to my needs.

content.title: How well did the app's content meet your expectations?
content.min: 0 stars: The content did not meet my expectations.
content.max: 5 stars: The content completely exceeded my expectations.

content.title: Is the content presented in a clear and understandable way?
content.min: 0 stars: The content is poorly structured or confusing.
content.max: 5 stars: The content is well presented and easy to understand.

sharing.title: How likely are you to recommend this app to a friend?
sharing.min: 0 stars: I would not recommend it at all.
sharing.max: 5 stars: I would definitely recommend it.

sharing.title: How comfortable would you feel sharing this app with someone else?
sharing.min: 0 stars: I would not feel comfortable sharing it.
sharing.max: 5 stars: I would feel very comfortable sharing it.

sharing.title: Do you think this app could be useful to people close to you?
sharing.min: 0 stars: I don't think it would be useful to others.
sharing.max: 5 stars: I'm sure it would be very useful to people close to me.
